solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public TreeNode lowestCommonAncestor(TreeNode root, TreeNode p, TreeNode q) {--newline--        return (root.val - p.val) * (root.val - q.val) < 1 ? root :--newline--               lowestCommonAncestor(p.val < root.val ? root.left : root.right, p, q);--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
